channel.title: CoEDL on Jayden Macklin-Cordes
channel.description: Recent content in CoEDL on Jayden Macklin-Cordes

item.title: CoEDL Summer School 2018
item.description: In November, I’ll be attending CoEDL’s Summer School for 2018. I believe I’ll be giving a short presentation in the course Visualizing Language Data for Analysis and Communication (Lydia Byrne) on my strategies for visualising phylogenetic signal in phonotactic characters. I’m also greatly looking forward to the course Machines can do the work, can’t they? Machine Learning for linguists by Daan van Esch and guests.
